name: LOVEMONGER
description:
Welcome to LOVEMONGER!

You are the lovemonger, and your job is to assign people into their most compatible relationships possible! Each person will have a compatibility score with another, and your job is to match them with their most compatible. It doesn't matter if their most compatible relationship isn't their happiest, and you may need to break some hearts and some existing relationships in order to find them their best match.

After all, you know what's best for them.

------------------------------------------------------------

This game is an entry for Major Jam 2. The theme is Love, and the limitation is that all sprites in the game are contained within a single 128x128px texture file.

As per the rules, the game's spritesheet can be found here (or here).

You can also see the source code, along with full commit history on GitHub (linked on this page).

Enjoy!
